duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage logistics and supply chain operations to ensure efficient transportation, warehousing, and inventory management.
Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to optimize supply chain processes and meet performance metrics.
Monitor inventory levels and lead initiatives to minimize excess or obsolete stock, ensuring effective inventory control.
Plan and execute transportation strategies, including routing, carrier selection, and freight cost optimization.
Support procurement activities and supplier relationships to secure cost-effective and reliable sources of materials and services.
Identify and resolve operational issues, using analytical and problem-solving skills to improve processes and minimize disruptions.
Communicate effectively with stakeholders, internally and externally, to ensure smooth and efficient logistics operations.
Utilize data analysis and reporting tools to track key performance indicators and drive continuous improvement in supply chain operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business, or a related field
